import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {addQuantity, subQuantity} from '../Redux/Action' function PriceCard(props) { let { item, addQuantity, subQuantity} = props return (

{item.itemName}

â‚¹ {item.itemPrice}

Sub

) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ addQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(addQuantity(payload)), subQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(subQuantity(payload)) }) export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(PriceCard)
